conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to an isometric cutaway model with clear structural depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection and wall geometry. Minimal distortion in the isometric-like view.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in room adjacency and wall proportions. Some window placements on external walls are slightly modified but accurate to the plan's intent.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture sets (bed, kitchen counters, sink, toilet) are present and correctly placed according to the layout.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and geometry. Points deducted due to text debris (UI contamination) appearing on the 3D floor surface.

detected_errors.description: Portions of the 2D text labels ('ITCHEN', 'DINING') are rendered directly onto the 3D floor mesh.

summary: A highly accurate 3D transformation that maintains room proportions and furniture placement while exhibiting minor text rendering artifacts on the floor.
